duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to event inquiries and transform them into booked events
Communicate all the amazing features and benefits of our venue and event packages to prospective clients
Consistently meet (or, better yet, wildly exceed) your individual monthly sales goal
Understand the unique needs of all types of events—from corporate functions to birthday parties to other social events
Enter and manage all client information in client database
Be available to work weekends, holidays, and/or extended workdays
Diligently tend to your client relationships both during the planning process and beyond

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (preferably in Marketing, Advertising, Communications or Hospitality)
